abstract: David Einhorn said Tuesday that his firm had raised the size of its Apple holdings. The move came after Apple agreed to quintuple the size of its stock buyback program and increase its dividend.
snippet: David Einhorn said Tuesday that his firm had raised the size of its Apple holdings. The move came after Apple agreed to quintuple the size of its stock buyback program and increase its dividend.
lead_paragraph: When Apple  agreed to extensively expand its stock buyback program last month, David Einhorn was pleased.

headline.main: Pleased by Apple’s Move, Einhorn Raises His Bet

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
